title: Europe has to act promptly on refugee and automobile crises, say Merkel, Hollande and Weber ...
text: (Source: EPP Group) 10.09.2015 The flood of refugees from the Middle East headed up the State of the Union priorities with Commission President Jean-Claude Juncker calling for greater solidarity.
